name: Refactor!
description:
This game is the result of a few months of work, in an attempt to see if a game mixing elements from Overcooked with automation would be viable. There is no lose condition, there is no sound/music, just an idea.

How to Play

The game currently consists of 5 levels, gradually increasing in complexity. You'll have access to different tools in order to make the correct product.

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Select/Interact

Right Mouse Button - Deselect

Escape - Menu

WASD - Move Camera
